tags: None
review:
We are very fortunate to have a doctor like Dr.Sameera for our son. What I like about Dr.Sameera is her vast experience *** ******** ** ********** ****** ** ****** **** ** **** *** ********** She never prescribes unnecessary medicine and tests. She very patiently listens to concerns and gives great feedback to parents.

It also amazes me that she remembers everything about my son even if I visit after 6 months and will enquire about his overall progress.

I would very highly recommend Dr.Sameera as a paediatrician for every kid :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am lucky to have my baby under Dr Sameera's care since his birth. My son was born prematurely. Dr Sameera was very prompt with her NICU timing, patiently answered all our queries, provided every info required in caring for premature baby. Talking to her was a great relief and assuring for us in those tested times. 
At OPD she is punctual, listens very patiently* ********* ******* *** prescribes minimal medication. Never prescribed unnecessary test.Every visit she tracks milestones, vaccination and guides about govt immunization program .With her smiling face and assuring nature baby care has been effortless for me in terms of medical aspects.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My daughter is premature. We always make sure her treatment is done under **** doctor. Recently we relocated to another place in Bangalore. So our first concern was to search a good doctor r for our daughter. Then through online search and seeing her reviews we visited her when my daughter was sick again because of seasonal change. And first visit only we had a sigh of relief that we found **** Doctor for our daughter. I am writing this review so that like me many parents who r searching for good doctor can be benefited.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Sameera is my son‚Äôs paediatrician since his birth 3.9 years ago. She‚Äôs the reason I could get my infant boy off bottle feeds and get him completely on mom‚Äôs milk! I was stunned when I received a text from her, as a new Mom, checking on how I was doing!!! Visits to her clinic are few but it almost feels like dropping in on a family friend‚Äôs home! 

She‚Äôs a doctor with a heart and her only passion seems like adding value with her expertise. What I love the most about her, she doesn‚Äôt rush you through with the appointment, super patient to answer the silliest of questions! I would definitely recommend her to anyone looking for genuine doctors in the Paediatrics  and Neo Natal segment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Nutritional Advice,Diet advise for infants and toddlers,Paediatric care,
review: First of all I would like to extend a huge thank you to Dr. Sameera. She assessed my baby thoroughly and spoke to me and put my mind at ease. I would definitely recommend her for new moms since she has the most practical and wisest advice for us. She is so friendly and helpful and understanding, all with a caring smile  at all times. I am so glad i got to meet her before flying to Germany.
